title: A Talent for Tony
creator_credit: Bruce Baker, Karl Holtsnider and Teleketics
brief_description: Parable, play and fantasy all combine to create for the younger child an experience in growth and faith. The father of five year old Tony is preparing for his art exhibition and sets his children to draw. Tony is unable to produce anything and retreats in fear, but with encouragement from his father the situation is resolved.
